@for (breadscrum of breadscrums; track breadscrum) {
}

Edit Staff

First name @if (staffForm.get('first')?.hasError('required')) { First name is required }
Last name
Gender Male Female @if (staffForm.get('gender')?.hasError('required')) { Gender is required }
Mobile
Password @if (staffForm.get('password')?.hasError('required')) { password is required }
Re-Enter Password @if (staffForm.get('conformPassword')?.hasError('required')) { Re-Enter password is required }
Designation
Select Department Library Administration Transport Laboratory @if (staffForm.get('department')?.hasError('required')) { Select Any Department }
Email @if (staffForm.get('email')?.hasError('email') && staffForm.get('email')?.touched) { Please enter a valid email address }
Date Of Birth @if (staffForm.get('dob')?.hasError('required')) { Please select date }
Address
Education
